item.title: Open Graph Support
item.description: Minimo has built-in support for Open Graph tags. The extra configuration options used by Open Graph tags are noted below. You can set Facebook’s App ID and Admins tags by the following config options: [params.opengraph] [params.opengraph.facebook] admins = "" appid = "" admins field accepts a single Facebook Profile ID number. appid field accepts a single Facebook Application ID number. item.title: Translation Support
item.description: You can translate Minimo in your own language! For example, if you want to translate Minimo in Spanish, you will have to add this to your site’s config file: defaultContentLanguage = "en" [languages] [languages.es] lang = "es" languageName = "Spanish" weight = 1 Then create a folder named /i18n/ in your site’s root. And create a file /i18n/es.toml with the translated strings. For reference format you can see the en.

item.title: Menus
item.description: Minimo has two menus. Main Menu Social Menu Main Menu Main menu is located at the top of the site. For adding content entries to the Main menu simply add the menu variable in it’s Front Matter. For TOML format: +++ menu = "main" +++ For YAML format: --- menu: main --- For JSON format: { "menu": "main" } For adding non-content entries, you will have to specify it in the site’s config file.

item.title: Pagination
item.description: Minimo supports pagination on List pages. For configuring it, there are two options: Paginate PaginatePath Details can be found at Hugo’s Pagination Documentation.
